effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.
